value:
There are two things I cannot abide:
monsters who would sow chaos, and
evil that would sow destruction!

Never despair, no matter what!
The light of hope will not abandon
those with hope in their hearts!

The Sacred Stones, great treasures
with the power to repel darkness...$k$pIt is said that in ancient times great
heroes sealed away the Demon King
with their blessed power.

I have a dream! It's to go journeying,
once my uncle permits me, in order
to destroy monsters!

Ugh! I'm so irritated...I could yank
an old man's beard!

You! I hear you always take good
care of $Nf.

Light will shine in the hearts of the
people as long as I live! Eradication
is what awaits darkness everywhere!

Losing is inconceivable to me!
Justice always wins!

Ahem... I am L'Arachel, the beautiful
princess of Rausten!

Oh, you're just in time to come offer
up your prayers with me. Come on!$k$pProtect Rausten, O Saint Latona...
Bless us with your light...$k$pThat we may extinguish evil and
banish the darkness that plagues
the land...$k$pI will one day destroy the monsters
of the Darkling Woods and bring
peace to the world!$k$pI pray for that day to come as soon
as possible!$k$pOnce I have done that, I will save all
those who grieve in the world... And
all the future will be bathed in light!
I am L'Arachel, the princess of Rausten!
I can tell you're excited to be speaking to someone so noble as I!
When I grow up, I'm going to beat so many monsters all on my own!
My mother and father... They left me... I'd give anything to see them.
*giggle* I like you! I shall make you my vassal!
